fileDescription: Extend your game with local multiplayer fun

airconsole.name: AirConsole
airconsole.description: Extend your game with local multiplayer fun

max-player.name: Max players
max-player.desc: Set the maximum players allowed to connect before triggering the 'on too many players' trigger

on-connect.description: Triggered when a device connects to the game.

on-disconnect.description: Triggered when a device disconnects from the game.

on-device-disconnect.description: Triggered when a device disconnects from the game.

on-too-many-players.description: Triggered when a device connects but the max player limit property is reached or exceeded.

on-premium-connect.description: Triggered when a device becomes premium or when a premium device connects.

on-message.description: Triggered when receiving a message from any device.

on-message-from.description: Triggered when receiving a message from a specific device.

device-id.name: Device id
device-id.desc: The device id the message should be from

on-message-is.description: Triggered when receiving a message with a specific content.

property-name.name: Property name
property-name.desc: The message property to compare to

on-message-from-is.display-text: On message property {0} is {1} and from device id {2}
on-message-from-is.description: Triggered when receiving a message with a specific content from a specific device.

property-name.name: Property name
property-name.desc: The message property to compare to

device-id.name: Device id
device-id.desc: The device id the message should be from

on-message-has-property.description: Triggered when a message from any device has a specific property.

property-name.name: Property name
property-name.desc: The property name to check the existence of

is-multipart-message.description: True if the last received message has more than one property set, false otherwise.

is-device-user-connected.display-text: Is device id {0} user logged in
is-device-user-connected.description: True if the device's user is logged in, false otherwise.

device-id.name: Device id
device-id.desc: The device id to check if connected

on-ad-complete.description: Triggered when an advertisement is finished or no advertisement was shown.

on-ad-show.description: Triggered when an advertisement is shown.

on-persistent-data-loaded.description: Triggered when persistent data was loaded from RequestPersistentData.

on-persistent-data-stored.description: Triggered when persistent data was stored from StorePersistentData.

on-highscores-stored.description: Triggered when highscores storing is done.

on-device-profile-change.description: Triggered when a device updates it's profile pic, nickname or email.

on-custom-device-state-change.description: Triggered when a device updates it's custom device state.

is-premium.description: True if the device's user is premium, false otherwise.

device-id.name: Device id
device-id.desc: The device id to check if premium

is-plugin-offline.description: True if the plugin loaded as offline, false otherwise.

game-ready.description: Sets the game as ready. This will trigger OnConnect for all already connected devices.

message.description: Sends a message to a specific device.

device-id.name: Device id
device-id.desc: The device id to send the message to

broadcast.description: Sends a message to all connected devices

set-custom-device-state-property.description: Sets a device custom state property.

request-highscores.description: Requests highscores. OnHighScores triggered when the highscores are returned.

uids.name: Uids
uids.desc: A comma separated list of users UIDs that should be included in the result. Use 'all' for all connected controllers

ranks.name: Ranks
ranks.desc: A comma separated list of high score rank types. High score rank types can include data from across the world, only a specific area or a users friends. Valid array entries are 'world', 'country', 'region', 'city', 'friends'. Use comma to separate the types if you need more than one

total.name: Total
total.desc: Amount of high scores to return per rank type

top.name: Top
top.desc: Amount of top high scores to return per rank type. top is part of total

store-highscores.description: Stores highscores. OnHighScoreStored triggered when the request is completed.

level-name.name: Level name
level-name.desc: The name of the level the user was playing. This should be a human readable string because it appears in the high score sharing image. You can also just pass an empty string

level-version.name: Level version
level-version.desc: The version of the level the user was playing. This is for your internal use

score.name: Score
score.desc: The score the user has achieved

uid.name: Uid
uid.desc: The UIDs of the users that achieved the high score. Can be a single uid or an array of uids. Default is the uid of this device. Use comma to separate multiple UIDS

data.name: Data
data.desc: Custom high score data (e.g. can be used to implement Ghost modes or include data to verify that it is not a fake high score)

score-string.name: Score string
score-string.desc: A short human readable representation of the score. (e.g. '4 points in 3s'). Defaults to 'X points' where x is the score converted to an integer
